p: Bug Dorm insect rearing cages (29.9 cm 3) were obtained from BioQuip Products (Rancho Dominguez, CA). A HotHands hand warmer was used as the heat source and these were procured from Kobayashi LLC (Dalton, GA). Crude commercial catnip oil was obtained from Plant Therapy Essential Oils (Twin Falls, ID). TetraMin Tropical Tablets used for mosquito rearing were purchased from Tetra (Blacksburg, VA). FisherBrand filter paper circles (18.5 cm; 09-795 G) were obtained from Fisher Scientific Co. (Fair Lawn, NJ).
